title: Get all COMPANY-has-image Relationships
user_story:
As an API consumer\
I want to be fetch all IMAGES that are attached to a COMPANY\
So I can create an image gallery for the COMPANY
description:
* A list of all ›has-image‹ relationships for the selected COMPANY is returned when there exists at least one of them. -> Status Code \`200\`
* Each item in the list contains the relationship ID and the two node IDs, but not the nodes itself.
* An empty list is returned when no ›has-image‹ relationship exists. -> Status Code \`200\`
* Requests with invalid ID are rejected. This can happen when there exists no node with the given ID or it is not a COMPANY. -> Status Code \`404\`
